venue.address_2: Bay Colony Corporate Center, North Entrance
venue.name: Emerging Enterprise Center at Foley Hoag

item.description:
Folks,
After a short break, we're back in business!
We have a great line-up for the fall meetup, which for the 1st time, will combine the Cloud services meetup with the AWS one. This is a great opportunity to expand your network with experts on all things cloud and AWS specifically.

The agenda for the evening is:

1. Michael DeSilver SVP, Cloud Services at LTech will give a talk about CloudManage - Turning Amazon Web Services into Amazon Managed Services. I came across Michael & LTech when Aprigo was looking to get some help in managing our AWS environment as we expanded our product offering and ventured into more complex deployments, and so I'm happy to share this with other folks who might be in similar need.

LTech is also sponsoring this event - so thank you Michael on behalf of all the hungry attendees rushing to the event after a long workday!...

2. Ellen Rubin - Founder @ CloudSwitch
CloudSwitch delivers the enterprise gateway to the cloud. CloudSwitch’s innovative software appliance enables enterprises to run their applications in the right cloud computing environment—securely, simply and without changes. With CloudSwitch, applications remain tightly integrated with enterprise data center tools and policies, and can be moved easily between different cloud environments and back into the data center based on the requirements of the business.

group.name: The Boston Amazon Web Services Meetup Group

item.name: Boston AWS Fall Meetup
